title: blueprint
description: Defines an individual workflow as an extension of [GitHub workflows](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/using-workflows/workflow-syntax-for-github-actions) to include [skylounge-jobs](https://docs.skylounge.io/developing-blueprints/workflow-templates/skylounge-jobs), [skylounge-steps](https://docs.skylounge.io/developing-blueprints/workflow-templates/skylounge-steps), and [parameters](https://docs.skylounge.io/developing-blueprints/workflow-templates/parameters).
